Direct Known Subclasses:
CannotSelectIfHigher, CannotWinOnPerimeter, OpponentCannotMoveUp, PlayerWinWith5CompleteBuildings
public class SetEffectOnOpponent
extends DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
Parent class for the divinities that can apply an effect on the other players, modifying their move, build or winning condition.
